content: I think I'll stick with the monogrammed notebook, notecards, and heartfelt note for now. I want to keep it simple yet thoughtful. I might consider adding a small gift card to her favorite coffee shop or restaurant, but I'll think about it some more. By the way, I've been thinking about my sister's birthday gift from last month, a silver necklace with a small pendant from a local boutique store. It cost around $50 and I paid using my credit card.
